com.nequissimus.university.k1584

Enum PetriController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<PetriController>
      • com.nequissimus.university.k1584.PetriController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<PetriController>, java.lang.Runnable

    public enum PetriController
extends java.lang.Enum<PetriController>
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Main controller for the Petri net application that is implemented as a singleton to make sure no application has more than one controller/UI/logic.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      INSTANCE
      Controller instance.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Temporary element for disconnecting an arrow from it.

      Currently active logical net.

      Bidirectional map for logical objects and UI components.

      Logic master.
      private PetriUi ui
      User interface master.

      • arrowConnect

        public void arrowConnect(AbstractLabel label)
        Connect arrow to this label. If this is the first label chosen, save it for further use. If this is the second label chosen, create a connection with the first one selected.
        Parameters:
        label - Selected label

      • arrowConnect

        private void arrowConnect(AbstractLabel from,
                AbstractLabel to)
        Connect two labels with an arrow and make a logical connection.
        Parameters:
        from - Label to connect from
        to - Label to connect to

      • arrowDisconnect

        public void arrowDisconnect(AbstractLabel label)
        Disconnect this label from the one chosen next. If a label was chosen before, it will be used to disconnect from the current one.
        Parameters:
        label - Label to disconnect

      • arrowDisconnect

        private void arrowDisconnect(AbstractLabel from,
                   AbstractLabel to)
        Disconnect two labels.
        Parameters:
        from - Disconnect from this label
        to - Disconnect from this target label
